high_descs: Turn around and head straight, then proceed to turn left towards the bed.
Pick up cloth from the bed .
Turn around towards the sink at the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Shifting cloth from one place to another.

high_descs: Turn around and move towards the bed
pick the cloth from the bed
Turn right towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: switch on the desk lamp and check the cloth

high_descs: Turn left and make a turn around and go straight, turn left towards the bed
Pick up cloth from the bed
Turn right and go straight towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a cloth by the light of a desk lamp
